lead_paragraph: The Dow was down 0.5 percent as investors looked ahead to a busy week for quarterly results, including some of the biggest U.S. banks.

headline.print_headline: Shares Fall Slightly on Eve of Earnings Season
headline.main: Modest Loss for the Market in a Big Week for Corporate Earnings

snippet: The Dow was down 0.5 percent as investors looked ahead to a busy week for quarterly results, including some of the biggest U.S. banks.
abstract: Investors look ahead to busy week for company earnings, sending stocks down slightly.
